导航菜单具有三种显示模式，其中`horizontal`模式会在宽度受限时自动呈现.en-us: The navigation menu has three display modes, where `horizontal` mode is automatically displayed when the width is restricted.

配合参数`menuItemKeyToTitle`可以将指定的菜单项标题用组件元素.en-us: With the parameter `menuItemKeyToTitle`, you can replace the title of the specified menu item with a component element.

为导航菜单设置初始化时就处于展开状态的子菜单节点。.en-us: Set the sub-menu nodes of the navigation menu to be expanded when the navigation menu is initialized.

为导航菜单设置初始化时就处于选中状态的菜单项节点。.en-us: Set the menu item nodes of the navigation menu to be selected when the navigation menu is initialized.

为各菜单项快捷设置前缀图标。.en-us: Set the prefix icon for each menu item.

菜单项节点可设置对应的跳转链接地址。.en-us: The menu item node can set the corresponding jump link address.

使用导航菜单内置的折叠状态控制功能。.en-us: Use the built-in collapse status control function in the navigation menu.

配合侧边栏自定义控制折叠.en-us: Customize the control collapse with the sidebar

配合侧边栏组件**AntdSider**可实现针对导航菜单更灵活的折叠控制。.en-us: With the **AntdSider** component of the sidebar, you can control the collapse of the navigation menu with the sidebar.

子菜单逐级缩进的像素宽度可调整。.en-us: The sub-menu indent width in pixels can be adjusted at each level.

设置参数`expandIcon`自定义树节点的展开/折叠图标。.en-us: Set the parameter `expandIcon` to customize the tree node's expand/collapse icon.

控制子菜单展开触发行为.en-us: Control the sub-menu expand trigger behavior

设置参数`triggerSubMenuAction='click'`控制子菜单展.en-us: Set the parameter `triggerSubMenuAction='click'` to control the sub-menu expand trigger behavior to click.

通过回调监听当前选中的菜单项。.en-us: Listen to the selected menu item through the callback listener.

通过回调监听参数`currentItem`、`currentKeyPath`、`.en-us: Listen to the parameter `currentItem`、`currentKeyPath`、`currentItemPath` to get more selected item information.
